Aster Fialla Portfolio
Contact

Art

I'm a self-taught digital illustrator and comic creator, primarily focused on character art. My work has been published in several zines and I do commissions. Further examples of my art are on my various social media accounts @pieartsy; you can find links to those in the upper right corner of my website. More information on my commissions can be found here: Commissions.

Digital Comics Projects

Comics

Digital Comics Projects

Projects

Twilight's Oasis rulebook art

2022

Rulebook art for the mythical Cynosures from the upcoming LARP, Twilight's Oasis. A preview of the rulebook can be seen here: Instagram link.

Get in the Fucking Robot cover

2021

A cover for the PDF of the tabletop RPG, Get in the Fucking Robot, by Penguin King Games. Link to the playtest version of the game here: Get in the Fucking Robot.

Make a Scene

2020

An anthology of LARPs. I illustrated the cover art for Boldly Go. The anthology has a Kickstarter at this link: Kickstarter. More information about the Make a Scene festival can be found here: Make a Scene.

Fandom Zines

2017-2019

Several comics done for zines in the My Hero Academia and Voltron: Legendary Defender fandoms. These zines were focused around celebrating concepts or specific characters from each piece of media.

  • Enough Love to Go Around zine: website link
  • Your Power zine: link with details
  • The Gorgeous Man zine: website link

Serving Pride: The Queer History Dinner Party Handbook

2017

An illustrated handbook of queer history presented as a dinner party. I illustrated the art for the candle ritual in Chapter 6. More info on the handbook can be found at this link: Serving Pride.
